metadata.name: GODDESS N°1 SILVER
metadata.description:
FIRST ELPIS GODDESS IN SILVER VERSION

In Greek mythology, Elpis was the goddess of hope. she was depicted as a young woman holding flowers in her hands.

Embodied by Adeline 
Photographed by Antoine Verglas 
Designed and set in motion by Side NFT Gallery 

A single photographic print estimated at 2000€ will be offered to the first buyer.
(16x20 inches/40.6x50.8 cm)
